org.taverna.server.master.notification

Class NotificationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.taverna.server.master.notification.NotificationEngine

  • public class NotificationEngine
extends Object
    A common object for handling dispatch of event-driven messages.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

      • setDispatchers

        public void setDispatchers(List<MessageDispatcher> dispatchers)
        Parameters:
        dispatchers - The various dispatchers we want to install.

      • setUniversalDispatchers

        public void setUniversalDispatchers(List<MessageDispatcher> dispatcherList)
        Parameters:
        dispatcherList - A list of dispatch objects to always dispatch to.

      • dispatchMessage

        public void dispatchMessage(TavernaRun originator,
                            String destination,
                            NotificationEngine.Message message)
                     throws Exception
        Dispatch a message over the notification fabric.
        Parameters:
        originator - What workflow run was the source of this message?
        destination - Where the message should get delivered to. The correct format of this is either as a URI of some form (where the scheme determines the dispatcher) or as an invalid URI in which case it is just tried against the possibilities to see if any succeeds.
        subject - The subject line of the message.
        message - The plain text body of the message.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong with the dispatch process.

      • listAvailableDispatchers

        public List<String> listAvailableDispatchers()
        Returns:
        The message dispatchers that are actually available (i.e., not disabled by configuration somewhere).
